summary: Results-driven sales professional with extensive experience in sales management, territory sales, online advertising, and business development. Proven ability to build relationships, drive revenue, manage cross-functional teams, and negotiate strategic partnerships across multiple industries.

experience.title: Sales Manager / Territory Sales Manager
experience.description: Selling and working with franchises and strategic partners on a mobile loyalty platform. Working with digital and advertising agencies on reselling products. Selling local clients in the Arkansas territory on the mobile loyalty platform.

experience.title: Marketing Executive / Senior Sales Consultant
experience.description: Researched, developed, and cultivated leads for LivingSocial Deals; exceeded sales goals; qualified prospective clients by phone and closed deals in person; used consultative sales to assess merchant goals and propose solutions; managed relationships and drafted proposals and contracts; documented sales activities in Salesforce; collaborated with operations.

experience.title: Business Manager
experience.description: Selling online advertising, sponsorships, and contests to strategic accounts and new customers.

experience.title: Local Sales Manager
experience.description: Managed 9 Local Account Executives; team building; inventory management; controlled paid programming and direct response accounts; point person for Internet sales; received the New York Times "Rules of the Road" Award for Top Performer 2007.

experience.title: Retail Account Executive / Internet Advertising Manager
experience.description: Developed new and serviced existing accounts related to newspaper design; implemented marketing plans for individual clients; worked with advertising agencies; created Internet Sales Department; developed Internet advertising on newspaper websites.

experience.title: Senior Buyer
experience.description: Remote senior buyer researching for new and exciting products; established partnerships with designers and manufacturers; pitched brand vendors to work with Touch of Modern; managed dozens of accounts; planned sales events; negotiated pricing and terms.
